description: A full-featured online judge platform supporting problem-solving, code submission, and real-time evaluation. Built using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
A Python + SQLite based application that manages user accounts, transactions, and loans with a secure backend architecture.

A real-time hand-tracking module built using Python, OpenCV and MediaPipe. Detects and tracks hands via webcam, identifies up to 21 landmarks per hand, and is customizable for gesture recognition and VR applications.
An online chatting platform where users can log in and communicate in a single shared chatroom. Built with React, Node.js, and WebSocket for real-time messaging.

A ipython based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) app that accepts a file, web page, or raw text as input, and generates meaningful insights, summaries, and conclusions based on the provided content. Powered by LangChain, LLMs, and vector databases.
